name: To The Light (itch) (Daromaru)
description:
'To the light' - a game by Denis Kotenko and Pavel Sergaziev, created in Unity for the Brackeys Game Jam (August 2018).

You're a little hungry caterpillar. Find and eat leaves. Eat enough, and you will evolve. After that - go find the light!

Yea, and try not to die. A free tip: be careful, go slow, and you will win. Probably ;)
